articles.author: Amanda Sealy and Hollie Silverman, CNN
articles.title: 100,000 more people could die by December, Fauci says. But it is still possible to turn it around - CNN
articles.description: With nearly 100,000 Americans hospitalized with Covid-19 and infections surging among the unvaccinated population, it's possible another 100,000 people could die from the virus by December, according to a recent University of Washington model.

articles.title: Top Chinese and American diplomats discuss Afghanistan amid tense relations - South China Morning Post
articles.description: In phone conversation, Foreign Minister Wang Yi says coordination between China and the US over Afghanistan would depend on Washington’s policies towards Beijing in other areas.

articles.title: US drone strike hits Islamic State car bomb in Kabul as withdrawal nears end - CNA
